overview: Regency is a fatherless fifteen year old. After her mother contracts the AIDS virus, Regency must learn to survive on her own. With her mother on her death bed, Regency is forced to prostitute herself to feed her addictions, attend to her motherâ€™s needs, and pay the rent. My pink shirt is a tale of the loss of humanity, betrayal, and drug addiction. Will she overcome all of these obstacles and earn the chance to follow her true dreams? Or will her experiences with the darker parts of life destroy her humanity forever?
title: My Pink Shirt
